javadoc:
Tool created by the workspace when the user chooses to create a new
 tool. Its ToolConfigProvider shows all Plugins with the exception of
 those plugins that can be added to the Front End tool only.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: project
params.comment: the project associated with the tool

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new GhidraTool using an existing template.

params.name: project
params.comment: project that is the associated with the tool.

params.name: template
params.comment: the template to use when creating the tool

methods.javadoc:
Looks for extensions that have been installed since the last time this tool
 was launched. If any are found, and if those extensions contain plugins, the user is
 notified and given the chance to install them.
methods.name: checkForNewExtensions
methods.comment:
Looks for extensions that have been installed since the last time this tool
 was launched. If any are found, and if those extensions contain plugins, the user is
 notified and given the chance to install them.

name: GhidraTool
comment:
Tool created by the workspace when the user chooses to create a new
 tool. Its ToolConfigProvider shows all Plugins with the exception of
 those plugins that can be added to the Front End tool only.
